properties.name: nid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's unique identifier.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: vid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's unique revision identifier of the current version.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: type
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's machine readable content type name.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: language
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's default language.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: title
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's title.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: uid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's unique user identifier who created it.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: status
properties.doc: /** * The node's status, one of NODE_NO_PUBLISHED, NODE_PUBLISHED. * * @var integer */

properties.name: created
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's creation timestamp.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: changed
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's changed timestamp.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: comment
properties.doc: /** * Whether comments are allowed on this node, one of COMMENT_NODE_HIDDEN, * COMMENT_NODE_CLOSED, COMMENT_NODE_OPEN. * * @var integer */

properties.name: promote
properties.doc: /** * Whether this node is promoted to the frontpage or not, one of NODE_NOT_PROMOTED, NODE_PROMOTED. * * @var integer */

properties.name: sticky
properties.doc: /** * Whether this node is sticky or not, one of NODE_NOT_STICKY, NODE_STICKY. * * @var integer */

properties.name: tnid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's unique identifier of the translation source (or parent, if node is a translation).
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: translate
properties.doc: /** * Whether the translation needs updating or not (0 no update, 1 needs update). * * @var integer */

properties.name: revision_uid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's unique user identifier who created the current revision.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: body
properties.doc:
/** * The node's body content; long text field with summary. * * NOTE
* Don't assume that this field will exist, as it is possible to remove it via Manage Fields on each content type. * Similarly, modules that define a custom node content type may not even attach a body in the first place. * * @var array */

properties.name: log
properties.doc:
/**
 * Message left by the creator of this revision, explaining the changes.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: revision_timestamp
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's revision creation timestamp.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: name
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's creator user name.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: picture
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's creator user avatar.
 *
 * @var ?
 */

properties.name: cid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's unique identifier of the last comment.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: last_comment_timestamp
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's timestamp of the last comment.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: last_comment_name
properties.doc:
/**
 * The name of the user who last left a comment.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: last_comment_uid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The unique identifier of the user who last left a comment.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: comment_count
properties.doc:
/**
 * The node's total comment count.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: data
properties.doc:
/**
 * Serialized string of data associated with the node.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: rdf_mapping
properties.doc:
/**
 * W3C standard to describe structured data.
 *
 * @link http://api.drupal.org/api/drupal/modules!rdf!rdf.module/group/rdf/7
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: fid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The file's unique identifier.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: uid
properties.doc:
/**
 * The file's unique user identifier who uploaded the file.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: filename
properties.doc:
/**
 * The file's name (including the extension).
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: uri
properties.doc:
/**
 * The file's canonical absolute URI.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: filemime
properties.doc:
/**
 * The file's MIME type.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.name: filesize
properties.doc:
/**
 * The file's size in Bytes.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: status
properties.doc:
/**
 * The file's status.
 *
 * @var integer
 */

properties.name: timestamp
properties.doc:
/**
 * The file's timestamp.
 *
 * @todo Is this the timestamp of creation or change?
 * @var integer
 */

properties.doc:
/**
 * The term's unique identifier.
 *
 * @var integer|string
 */

properties.doc:
/**
 * The term's unique vocabulary identifier.
 *
 * @var integer|string
 */

properties.doc:
/**

 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.doc:
/**
 * The term's description.
 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.doc:
/**

 *
 * @var string
 */

properties.doc:
/**
 * The term's weight.
 *
 * @var integer|string
 */

properties.doc:

 * The term's depth.
 *
 * @var integer|null
 */

  • 0 inactive

picture
